name: Darktranslations Dark Theme
description: A theme that modifies Dark Translations wordpress to make a bit better for reading ^.^

additional_info: Last Update: 6/13/17 @ 6:48 AM EST Version Log: •Version 1.2 - Added two additional options. •Version 1.1 - Fixed Comments Area •Version 1.0 - Released. --- Note about additional options: •Featured image is the image displayed above the text/reading area. (Removed in the screenshot) •Tlk.io Widget is a chat widget located on the right side of the website. More info: here. •Lightswitch Widget is a widget that when clicked will redirect you to Light Translations.
